edu.columbia.cs.sdarts.util
Class HTTPRequest

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--edu.columbia.cs.sdarts.util.HTTPRequest
Direct Known Subclasses:
HTTPGet, HTTPPost
public abstract class HTTPRequest
extends java.lang.Object

Represents some kind of request to an HTTP server; either GET or POST. This class is used particularly in the edu.columbia.cs.sdarts.backend.www package to represent a call to a CGI-bin script on a web search engine.

getReader

public abstract java.io.BufferedReader getReader()
                                          throws java.io.IOException
Return a BufferedReader representing the output of the response to the request. Can only be called once, and cannot be called after an invocation of getInputStream().
